item.title: 巴基斯坦希望保留出售后的国有航空公司股份
item.description: 巴基斯坦计划保留国有巴基斯坦国际航空公司的股份，以便从出售后的价值增长中获益。【原文：Pakistan plans to retain a stake in state-owned Pakistan International Airlines to benefit from an increase in value after the sale.】

item.title: 勒庞极右翼面临斗争，对手团结一致
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞的竞争对手退出了将于周日举行的 223 场法国大选决选，以避免分裂对其极右翼政党国民联盟的选票，从而使她更难在议会中获得绝对多数。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s rivals pulled candidates out of 223 French election runoffs to be held on Sunday to avoid splitting the vote against her far-right National Rally party, making it more difficult for her to get an absolute majority in the legislature.】

item.title: 欧盟监察机构称法国和意大利必须抓紧时间解决预算问题
item.description: 欧盟的咨询监督机构敦促欧盟负债最重的国家控制大手大脚的开支，缩减被官员们认为过于膨胀的赤字。【原文：The European Union’s most indebted countries were urged by the bloc’s advisory watchdog to rein in spending largess and shrink deficits judged by officials to be far too expansive.】

item.title: 可可价格上涨，近期供应紧张影响下季作物产量盈余
item.description: 由于供应紧张导致美国库存下降，可可期货在纽约上涨，尽管商品经纪商 Marex 集团预测下一季产量会反弹。【原文：Cocoa futures rose in New York as supply tightness drives down US inventories, even as commodities broker Marex Group predicted a rebound in production in the next season.】

item.title: LME 将暂停诺里尔斯克芬兰工厂的镍交付
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所将暂停俄罗斯 MMC Norilsk Nickel PJSC 旗下芬兰工厂的镍交付，尽管西方国家对俄罗斯金属实施制裁，但该工厂的产品仍可继续交付。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is suspending deliveries of nickel from a plant in Finland owned by Russia’s MMC Norilsk Nickel PJSC, whose products have continued to be deliverable despite western sanctions on Russian metal.】

item.title: 北约盟国就向乌克兰提供 400 亿欧元资金的目标达成一致
item.description: 据北约外交官称，北约盟国周三一致同意，他们应争取每年向乌克兰提供至少 400 亿欧元（430 亿美元）的军事援助，但未对未来几年作出明确承诺。【原文：NATO allies agreed Wednesday they should aim to provide at least €40 billion ($43 billion) in military aid for Ukraine per year, but refrained from explicit pledges for the years ahead, according to alliance diplomats.】

item.title: 摩根大通的科拉诺维奇将在一连串糟糕的股票交易中离职
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通首席市场策略师兼全球研究联合主管马尔科-科拉诺维奇（Marko Kolanovic）即将离开摩根大通。【原文：Marko Kolanovic, JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s chief market strategist and co-head of global research, is leaving the bank, according to an internal memo obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 美国能源过剩现象日益严重，但目前仍是如此
item.description:
页岩、风能和太阳能产量的飙升至少造成了自1949年以来的最大供应过剩。然而，需求可能很快就会迎头赶上。【原文：

Soaring production from shale, wind and solar helped create the biggest glut since at least 1949. Yet demand may soon catch up.

】

item.title: 英国水务的政治和法律风险带来 "不可投资 "的警告
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The mounting political and legal difficulties facing British water companies make for a risky investment case, according to a Citigroup Inc. analyst.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行向 Intrum 出售房地产合伙公司股权
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）在简化资产管理的同时，出售了与 Intrum AB 公司的信贷和房地产合伙企业的股份。【原文：Banco Santander SA sold its stake in a credit and real estate partnership it had with Intrum AB as it simplifies management of its assets.】

item.title: 泽连斯基称乌克兰正在讨论将阿塞拜疆天然气输送到欧洲的问题
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）表示，乌克兰正在就从阿塞拜疆向欧盟输送天然气进行谈判，以保持其作为过境国的角色，并帮助西方邻国确保能源安全。【原文：Ukraine is in talks to send natural gas from Azerbaijan to the European Union as it seeks to maintain its role as a transit country and help western neighbors ensure energy security, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said.】

item.title: 供应忧虑加剧，基金纷纷看好欧洲天然气市场
item.description: 自 2021 年 11 月以来，投资基金对欧洲天然气价格的看涨程度最高，这表明市场坚信供应将趋紧。【原文：Investment funds are the most bullish on European gas prices since November 2021, signaling strong conviction in the market that supplies are set to tighten.】

item.title: 俄罗斯政府 6 月份石油收入增长近 50
item.description: 由于俄罗斯石油生产商适应了国际制裁并提高了原油出口价格，6 月份俄罗斯政府从石油行业获得的收入与去年同期相比增长了近 50%。【原文：Russia’s government revenue from the oil industry was almost 50% higher in June compared with a year earlier as the nation’s producers adapted to international sanctions and obtained higher prices for their crude exports.】

item.title: 南非大选后企业借款人回避债券市场
item.description: 5 月份的大选产生了一个广泛的联盟，投资者担心这个联盟可能会不稳定，因此南非的企业借款人正在避开债券市场。【原文：South Africa’s corporate borrowers are steering clear of the bond market following May’s election, which delivered a broad coalition that investors fear may prove unstable.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率回升至 7% 以上，融资活动放缓
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率重新攀升至 7% 以上，导致购房融资申请减少。【原文：US mortgage rates climbed back above 7% last week, driving a decline in applications to finance home purchases.】

item.title: 西南航空针对埃利奥特入股启动权利计划
item.description: 针对激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）增持该公司股份一事，美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Southwest Airlines Co. said it’s adopted a rights plan that aims to prevent what it called “de facto or negative control” of the airline without compensating other shareholders, responding to activist investor Elliott Investment Management building a stake in the company.】

item.title: 世界最大核聚变项目因延期而成本飙升
item.description: 世界上最大的聚变能实验的测试将被推迟数年，预计将增加数十亿美元的成本，这给已经昂贵得令人瞠目的项目带来了新的打击。【原文：Testing at the world’s biggest fusion-energy experiment will be delayed by years with billions of dollars in additional costs expected, dealing a fresh blow to an already eye-wateringly expensive project.】

item.title: 据说 MUFG 收购印度消费贷款公司股份的谈判陷入僵局
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s negotiations for a minority stake in HDFC Bank Ltd.’s consumer lending unit are stalling due to differences over how much say it will have in company strategy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 范围》称，法国投票结果可能会对评级造成压力
item.description: 范围评级公司（Scope Ratings）认为，法国在周日的决胜选举中最有可能出现的两种结果都将损害其修复公共财政的努力，并威胁到对欧洲的广泛影响。【原文：Both of France’s most likely outcomes in Sunday’s election runoff would hurt efforts to fix its public finances and threaten a wider European impact, according to Scope Ratings.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市势头不减，市场准备迎接繁忙的一天，债券投资者则为唐纳德-特朗普的潜在回归做好准备。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The momentum in stocks continues, markets get ready for a busy day of data and bond investors prepare for a potential Donald Trump return. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 中国提出私人债权人在早期债务重组谈判中的作用
item.description: 中国建议私人债权人参与发展中经济体债务重组谈判的早期阶段，以加快经常陷入分歧的复杂谈判。【原文：China has proposed that private creditors take part in the early stages of debt restructuring talks for developing economies to speed up complex negotiations that are often mired in disagreements.】

item.title: 土耳其射手的民族主义手势引发欧足联调查
item.description: 欧洲足球最高机构欧足联（UEFA）对土耳其后卫梅里赫-德米拉尔（Merih Demiral）展开调查，因为他在周二德国举行的 2024 年欧洲杯奥地利对阵土耳其的比赛结束时做了一个手势。【原文：UEFA, European football’s top body, opened an investigation into Turkish defender Merih Demiral after his hand gesture at the end of the EURO 2024 game between Austria and Turkey on Tuesday in Germany.】

item.title: 欧盟缉毒负责人警告：可卡因激增是公共卫生的 "定时炸弹
item.description: 新近改组的欧盟缉毒机构负责人警告说，随着欧洲继续与可卡因的大量流入以及由此导致的与贩毒有关的暴力事件激增作斗争，欧洲需要为未来几年毒品使用量增加所带来的代价高昂的公共卫生后果做好准备。【原文：Europe needs to brace for the costly public health consequences of higher drug use in the coming years as it continues to battle a massive inflow of cocaine and the resulting spike in trafficking-related violence, warns the head of the newly revamped European Union drugs agency.】

item.title: 飞利浦第二大投资者在呼吸暂停交易后增持股份
item.description: 在荷兰飞利浦公司解决了与睡眠呼吸机故障有关的索赔两个月后，第二家主要的荷兰皇家飞利浦公司投资者提高了对这家医疗技术巨头的持股比例。【原文：A second major Royal Philips NV investor raised its holding in the medical technology giant, two months after the Dutch firm settled claims linked to its faulty sleep apnea machines.】

item.title: 汉莎航空 3.25 亿欧元 ITA 航空交易获欧盟批准
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）对意大利 ITA 航空公司（ITA Airways）的 3.25 亿欧元（3.5 亿美元）投资获得了欧盟的批准，这使得意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）可以卸下这家航空公司的责任，因为这家航空公司的前身几十年来一直在消耗国家资源。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG’s €325 million ($350 million) investment in Italy’s ITA Airways won approval from the European Union, allowing Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni to offload responsibility for an airline whose predecessor was a drain on state resources for decades.】

item.title: 天气助力收获，俄罗斯小麦价格低于竞争对手
item.description: 俄罗斯小麦价格再次低于其他产地，原因是当地炎热的天气加快了收割速度，贸易商与竞争对手的出口商展开了竞争。【原文：Russian wheat prices have dipped below other origins again, as hot weather speeds up harvest there and traders compete with rival exporters.】

item.title: Wizz 总裁凯里离职，为三项晋升让路
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）总裁罗伯特-凯里（Robert Carey）已经离职，为这家匈牙利廉价航空公司的三名高管晋升铺平了道路。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc President Robert Carey has departed the airline, paving the way for promotions of three executives across the Hungarian budget carrier.】

item.title: 世界银行向赞比亚提供 2 亿美元用于抗旱
item.description: 赞比亚财政部发表声明称，世界银行已批准向赞比亚再拨款 2 亿美元，以帮助该国应对数十年来最严重的旱灾。【原文：The World Bank has approved a further $200 million of grants for Zambia to help the nation cope with its worst drought in decades, according to a statement from the Finance Ministry.】

item.title: 估计显示，法国左翼计划的成本是马克龙计划的六倍
item.description: 根据新的估算，参加法国立法选举的各政党在竞选时做出的承诺在成本上有很大差异，其中左翼联盟的成本最高，主要是因为它计划降低退休年龄。【原文：The parties contesting the French legislative election have made campaign promises that would vary radically in cost, according to new estimates, with the left-wing alliance’s coming in highest largely on its plan to cut the retirement age.】

item.title: 据说 Glencore 将在出价未果后撤回 Kazzinc 出售计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由于潜在买家的估值无法与其匹配，Glencore Plc 放弃了出售其在哈萨克斯坦矿业公司 Kazzinc 股份的计划。【原文：Glencore Plc has abandoned plans to sell its stake in Kazakh mining company Kazzinc after potential buyers failed to match its valuation, people familiar with the situation said.】
